Specific Beauty Daily Gentle Cleanser (2020 formulation)

Brand: Specific Beauty

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: WATER, CETYL ALCOHOL, PROPYLENE GLYCOL, STEARYL ALCOHOL, PEG-100 STEARATE, AMMONIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYLTAURATE/VP COPOLYMER, DECYL GLUCOSIDE, PROPYLHEPTYL CAPRYLATE, CHLORPHENESIN, SODIUM BENZOATE, POTASSIUM SORBATE, DISODIUM EDTA.

BATE, DISODIUM EDTA.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
